Hello!   
I am Sophia I am your friendly HR BOT. 
I am here to help you with your HR related topics.

body.text: You can ask me questions on the following topics and I will assist you in answering them to best of the knowledge. At any point in time you can request me to connect to an Expert.
Here is what I can help you with:

- 401k
- Travel Benefits
-  Leave Policy
- Health Benefits
